item.description:
EVENT: Would you like to go for a walk at Arnold Aboretum and look for hidden treasure at the same time? Then Letterboxing is for you. Letterboxing is an intriguing pastime combining navigational skills and rubber stamp artistry in a charming "treasure hunt" style outdoor quest. For more information check out http://letterboxing.org/. I will bring a notebook and rubber stamp, all you have to do is show up and be ready to search.

Trip's Coordinator: Cindy

RSVP: Requested by Sept. 8.

MEET: 2PM Arnold Arboretum, meet in front of Hunnewell Vistor Center at the Arnold Arboretum,125 Arborway, Jamaica Plain, Mass. 02130.
http://arboretum.harvard.edu/
http://arboretum.harvard.edu/visit/directions/

COST: Members are free. Guests are $5 which can be credited to a full Mosaic membership of $25
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP to get more details and make arrangements for meeting

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Letterboxing
